nodes.text: Bio-Engineer Poster was a poster available in the galaxy sometime after the Battle of Yavin, which took place during the Galactic Civil War between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic. The foreground depicted a genetically enhanced nudfuh—a species native to Rori, a moon of the planet Naboo—with a DNA strand in the background and a spinal bone to the left. It was colored in various shades of yellow and orange. Lettering at the bottom, in the Galactic Basic Standard alphabet known as Aurebesh, spelled out the word "Bio-Engineer".

Bio-Engineer Poster was a poster available to players of the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, which was released on June 26, 2003 and shut down on December 15, 2011.. It could be obtained by looting a picture printer and various other items from enemies within the game. Once collected, the player could combine the items and get a random painting or poster. The other artwork the player could receive were Droid in Contrast and Double Helix. Following the release of the New Game Enhancements game update in November 2005, the poster became random loot the player could receive after killing a humanoid enemy. The player could use the poster as decoration for his or her in-game home.
